block.p: Stefanie Fran Miller and Marshall Jay Jacobowitz were married last evening at the View on the Hudson, a restaurant in Piermont, N.Y. Rabbi Marcelo Bronstein performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Jacobowitz, 30, is a senior media executive at Cohn & Wolfe, a New York public relations agency. She graduated cum laude from the University of Massachusetts at Amherst. She is a daughter of Ronnie Miller and Edward G. Miller, both of New York, and is the stepdaughter of Bena Green.
Stefanie Fran Miller and Marshall Jay Jacobowitz were married last evening at the View on the Hudson, a restaurant in Piermont, N.Y. Rabbi Marcelo Bronstein performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Jacobowitz, 30, is a senior media executive at Cohn & Wolfe, a New York public relations agency. She graduated cum laude from the University of Massachusetts at Amherst. She is a daughter of Ronnie Miller and Edward G. Miller, both of New York, and is the stepdaughter of Bena Green.
Mr. Jacobowitz, 34, is a vice president and media research manager at Zenith Media Services in New York. He is a son of Rifkie and William Jacobowitz of Pittsburgh.
